GMavenPlus-Plugin:compile

Full name:

GMavenPlus:GMavenPlus-Plugin:1.0-alpha1-SNAPSHOT:compile

Description:

Compiles the main sources

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: compile.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
debug boolean - Whether Groovy compiler should be set to debug or not
Default value is: false.
sourceEncoding String - Encoding of source files
Default value is: ${project.build.sourceEncoding}.
targetBytecode String - Groovy compiler bytecode compatibility ("1.4" or "1.5")
Default value is: 1.5.
tolerance int - Groovy compiler error tolerance (the number of non-fatal errors (per unit) that should be tolerated before compilation is aborted)
Default value is: 0.
verbose boolean - Whether Groovy compiler should be set to verbose or not
Default value is: false.
warningLevel int - Groovy compiler warning level, should be one of below values * NONE 0 * LIKELY_ERRORS 1 * POSSIBLE_ERRORS 2 * PARANOIA 3
Default value is: 0.

Parameter Details

debug:

Whether Groovy compiler should be set to debug or not
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: false

sourceEncoding:

Encoding of source files
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.sourceEncoding}

targetBytecode:

Groovy compiler bytecode compatibility ("1.4" or "1.5")
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: 1.5

tolerance:

Groovy compiler error tolerance (the number of non-fatal errors (per unit) that should be tolerated before compilation is aborted)
  • Type: int
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: 0

verbose:

Whether Groovy compiler should be set to verbose or not
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: false

warningLevel:

Groovy compiler warning level, should be one of below values * NONE 0 * LIKELY_ERRORS 1 * POSSIBLE_ERRORS 2 * PARANOIA 3
  • Type: int
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: 0
